类 Help

  • java.lang.Object
    • Help

  • public class Help
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a help class for accomplishing some auxiliary functions.

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkValid

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkValid(java.lang.String[] args)
        A method to check the validity of input.
        参数:
        args - User input array.
        返回:
        If input is valid, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • isExists

        public static java.lang.Boolean isExists(java.lang.String url)
        A method to check if root directory exists or not.
        参数:
        url - Root directory path.
        返回:
        Check whether the root directory exists or not. If it exists, returns true.Otherwise, returns false.

      • isPosInt

        public static java.lang.Boolean isPosInt(java.lang.String str)
        A method to check the validity of input port number.
        参数:
        str - Port number from user input.
        返回:
        Check whether the input is a positive integer or not.If it's, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • createLogFile

        public static void createLogFile()
        A method to create a log file.

      • getCurrentTime

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentTime()
        A method to get the current time of a request.
        返回:
        The time string in a specific format.

      • updateLogFile

        public static void updateLogFile(java.net.InetAddress client,
                                 java.lang.String time,
                                 java.lang.String type,
                                 java.lang.String code,
                                 java.lang.String length)
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        A method to update request in log file.
        参数:
        client - The client which sends request.
        time - The time when sending a request from a client.
        type - The request type.
        code - The response code from server.
        length - The content length of response body.
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - throw a exception when there's an error.

      • closeLogFile

        public static void closeLogFile()
        A method to close the log file at the end.
